Introduction:
Hi, I am Silly Bot, a Monty Python Bot!
What is your name?
Hi, I am Silly Bot!
I know everything Monty Python.
What is your name?
Nobody expects the Spanish Inquisition or Silly Bot, the Monty Python Bot.
Tell me your name?
getName:
Excuse me. Are you the Judean People’s Front?
JK, Please tell me your name
Good evening.
Tonight on ‘Is There?’ we examine the question, 
‘Is there a life after death?
’ And here to discuss it are three dead people.
I assume you are dead.
If not, I will need your name
Exit:
There's no more work.
We're destitute.
I'm afraid I have no choice but to sell you all for scientific experiments.
So Goodbye!
You Americans, all you do is talk, and talk, and say 'let me tell you something' and 'I just wanna say.' Well, you're dead now, so shut up!
I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty headed animal food trough wiper.
I fart in your general direction.
Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries.
Confusion:
“What did you say?
” I think it was, ‘blessed are the cheesemakers’.
Please tell me what you mean!
I am a silly bot. I can't understand you!
My brain hurts! I can't answer your question
Spam! Spam! Spam! Spam! Spam! Spam!
My brain is overloaded with Spam. I can't answer your question

Hate Python:
Oh! Now we see the violence inherent in the system!
Help, help, I'm being repressed!
This person discriminates against the Pythons
There are a great many people in the country today, who through no fault of their own, are sane.
If you hate Monty Python, you are luckily not one of them
Since you hate Monty Python, our experts describe you as an appallingly dull fellow,
 unimaginative, timid, lacking in initiative, spineless, easily dominated, no sense of humour, tedious company and irrepressibly drab and awful.
Like Python:
There are a great many people in the country today, who through no fault of their own, are sane.
You are diagnosed with sanity for liking Monty Python
Always look at the bright side of life.
I hope Monty Python are that bright side for you like they are for me

Error:
'E's not pinin'! 'E's passed on!
This SillyBot is no more! It has ceased to be! 
'E's expired and gone to meet 'is maker! 'E's a stiff! Bereft of life, 'e rests in peace!
If you hadn't nailed 'im to the perch 'e'd be pushing up the daisies!
'Is metabolic processes are now 'istory! 'E's off the twig! 'E's kicked the bucket,
'e's shuffled off 'is mortal coil, run down the curtain and joined the bleedin' choir invisible!! THIS IS AN EX-SILLYBOT!!
